title.rendered: Know the meaning of NFTs: Non Fungible Token (2022)

content.rendered:
With the arrival of digitization and new technologies, the use of digital certificates in order to verify the signature of the different digital documents.

In addition, digital certificates offer truthfulness as well as recognition in the Internet environment. That is why they appear NFTs.

If you want to know and investigate even more about this concept, keep reading, from I will communicate we tell you.

What are NFTs?

Abbreviations NFT’sNon Fungible Token or Non-Fungible Token, deal with a series of digital certificates of authenticity, which share the same technology as the well-known cryptocurrencies and which have completely triggered an entire art market and new business models.

That is, it is a digital certificate of authenticity that, through blockchain technology (the same one used in cryptocurrencies), is associated with a single digital file.

It is a non-expendable good, which means that it is not consumed with its use, it cannot be replaced and, of course, it is not substitutable. NFTs are totally against moneyis something unique, unrepeatable and irreplaceable by another of the same characteristics.

Taken all this to digital realmNFTs they are individual units from image, video, audio, text or compressed file with a single value. This is possible because each digital asset gets an identifier in which metadata is recorded (author’s name, their initial value or their sales history) using block chain technology, which guarantees that the piece cannot be duplicated.
